text: Hello...  Whoever answered the phone... Can you please turn up the volume, so the rest of team 5280 can hear me?   Franco wanted me to call and give you some advice on how to respond to a customer wanting discounts... This is what you tell them...   I don't have any discounts, but what I do have are a very particular set of sales skills. Skills I have acquired over a very long career of wine dropping and cold calling. Skills that make me a nightmare for competitors like RingCentral. If you agree to go forward with Vonage business then that will be the end of it!!! I will not pursue you, but if you don't, I will look for you, I will take you to top golf, pay for your dinner and drinks and above all else...  I will effin close you!!  Ha Ha...  Oh and by the way.. In case you couldn't guess...  You are listening to a text-to-speech Call made with the Nexmo Voice API.  Have a nice day!
